item.title: Hack the Planet - Light Gray Globe Design for Computer Hackers
item.description: This cool design for computer hackers/programmers shows an earth globe with partial outlines of the landmasses of the Americas, Europe and Africa plus a graticule. In the center it reads "hack the planet" in capital letters surrounded by some secret code.
